name: 華國媛
objective: 討論多醣體在科技產業上的運用。本課程將討論多醣體在生醫產業上多元化的運用。多醣體及其衍生物產業應用上，例如:幾丁聚醣(chitin)是目前頗受矚目的高分子材料，在生醫材料、廢水處理、食品加工，以及紡織工業上都有其應用。課堂以討論近幾年的文獻為主。修課學生應已有基礎生物化學及分子生物等課程。
schedule:
Week 1-4 Review on glycconjugate structure & biosynthesis
Week 5-8 Review on glycoconjugates and biotechnology
Week 9 Midterm report
Week 10-12 Review on glycosyltransferase & glycconsidases
Week 13-16 Review on glycoconjugates & diseases
Week 17-18 Final orla presentation
scorePolicy: Midter written report (35%) + Final oral presentation (35%) + Class participation (10%)
